verses.text: \w The|strong="H1961"\w* praise \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* canticle \w for|strong="H0430"\w* David. \w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* aid \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* most High, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* abide under \w the|strong="H1961"\w* protection \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Jacob.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* say \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* Lord: Thou art \w my|strong="H5704"\w* protector, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* refuge: \w my|strong="H5704"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* trust.

\w For|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* hath delivered \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* snare \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hunters: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sharp \w word|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* overshadow thee \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* shoulders: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* under \w his|strong="H3588"\w* wings thou shalt trust.

\w His|strong="H1961"\w* truth shall compass thee \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* shield: thou shalt \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* afraid \w of|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* terror \w of|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* night.

\w Of|strong="H6153"\w* \w the|strong="H1242"\w* arrow \w that|strong="H1242"\w* flieth \w in|strong="H6153"\w* \w the|strong="H1242"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w*, \w of|strong="H6153"\w* \w the|strong="H1242"\w* business \w that|strong="H1242"\w* walketh about \w in|strong="H6153"\w* \w the|strong="H1242"\w* dark: \w of|strong="H6153"\w* invasion, or \w of|strong="H6153"\w* \w the|strong="H1242"\w* noonday devil.

\w A|strong="H3588"\w* thousand shall fall at thy side, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* ten thousand at thy right hand: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H3615"\w* nigh thee.

But thou shalt \w consider|strong="H7896"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* thy eyes: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* shalt see \w the|strong="H6440"\w* reward \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked.
\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou, O Lord, art \w my|strong="H3605"\w* hope: thou hast \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* most High thy refuge.

There \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* \w evil|strong="H0205"\w* come \w to|strong="H3117"\w* thee: \w nor|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* scourge come near thy dwelling.

\w For|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H5797"\w* hath given \w his|strong="H3045"\w* angels charge \w over|strong="H3045"\w* thee; \w to|strong="H3045"\w* keep thee \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* thy ways.

\w In|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* hands \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* bear thee \w up|strong="H0935"\w*: lest thou dash thy foot \w against|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* stone.

Thou shalt walk \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* asp \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* basilisk: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt trample \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w foot|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lion \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dragon.

\w Because|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* hoped \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H8055"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H3605"\w*: \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w protect|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w because|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* hath known \w my|strong="H3605"\w* name.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* cry \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* hear \w him|strong="H7200"\w*: \w I|strong="H3117"\w* am \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* tribulation, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* glorify \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* fill \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* length \w of|strong="H1121"\w* days; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* shew \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* salvation.
